content: hey give me 3 lines of motivational speech

Here are three lines of motivational speech for you:

"Believe in yourself, take the leap of faith, and watch the universe conspire to make your dreams a reality. Your only limit is your own mind, so dream big and never give up. You are capable of achieving greatness, so go out there and make it happen!"

Here are three simple motivational lines:

"You got this! Don't give up. Keep going!"
